sentence: MY-jer?' They said it's `MY-er.' How the hell do you get `MY-er' out of it?? Trump attacking Peter Meijer for the spelling of his last name pic.twitter.com/klNHboIKF8 While Trump may have thought he was making a great joke, people in Michigan may not have been so amused.
author: Stephanie Mencimer
title: At a Campaign Rally, Trump Mocked a Congressman's Name

sentence: How are you going to run an election system if you believe it's all fake?? (Rep. Peter Meijer, the hometown congressman and rare Republican who voted to impeach Trump, skulked around the periphery, unwilling to tell reporters which candidates he'd supported.)
author: Kara Voght
title: Republicans Are Trying to Seize Veto Power Over the 2024 Election

sentence: From the January/February 2022 issue: Tim Alberta on Peter Meijer and what the GOP does to its own dissenters There are different truths in politicsTrumps truth, Bidens truth, whatever, B.J.
author: Tim Alberta
title: How Politics Poisoned the Evangelical Church
